OK, enough marketing fluff. We're looking for a Creative/Copywriter to join our campaign-comms-brand team here at Premier Inn. They'll be given the keys to our hotel brands and asked to take them for a spin. Integrated/TTL campaigns . Social/PR/live engagement . Digital/physical products and experiences. Brand development (and even creation). You'll get to work on the lot and do so with a group of brilliant minds and highly-skilled creative folks. Best of all, for a company that genuinely cares…
